oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Full Degree Two del Pezzo Surfaces over Small Finite Fields
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Knecht, Amanda
Reyes, Kristofer
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Algebraic Geometry
14J26, 14G15, 14Q10
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hirschfeld classified split del Pezzo surfaces of degree at least three whose points are all contained on the lines in the surface. We continue his work and begin the classification of split degree two del Pezzo surfaces over finite fields whose points are all on the fifty-six exceptional curves of the surfaces.
Comment: 15 pages, 5 figures, stronger results than original post
